page.title: 20MILDENHALL:TRAFFIC ON THE A4
page.content: The{A4,}which runs to the south of Mildenhall, is the main road in this area.The speed limit is 30mph in villages and 60mph normally.As a result of our survey, which was carried out in pouring rain between 1.30 and 2.30 on Tuesday 25 June,we counted 315 cars,64 lorries and 42 vans.Coming out of Marlborough there were more vans than lorries but going into Marlborough there were more lorries than vans.This might imply that lorries go through Marlborough to go to Bath, Bristol etc and return later in the day or early the next morning.We also counted 4 motorbikes, 2 caravans,4 buses,3 cycles,1 tractor and 1 ambulance.The lack of cycles and motorbikes might be explained by the rain.The 2 caravans might be explained by the start of the holiday season.
